name: Heilongjiang Dongning Hexing Coal Mine
company_mentions: Dongning Hexing Coal Mine Co Ltd

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E4%B8%9C%E5%AE%81%E5%92%8C%E5%85%B4%E7%85%A4%E7%9F%BF%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Heilongjiang Dongning Hexing Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Jiufogou, Laoheshan Town, Dongning City

operators: Dongning Hexing Coal Mine Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Dongning Hexing Coal Mine Co Ltd, which holds 100% ownership.
